message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $10,000. I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $7,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000? This offer reflects the product's worth while acknowledging your interest.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $9,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8,500. That's the highest I can go, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
